statements.statements: $L.temp.fields={};for $L.x = 1 to lng(field in $L.search.record) do ($L.x in $L.temp.fields=8 in $L.x in field in $L.search.record)

for $L.x = 1 to lng(denull($L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link)) do (if ($L.field~="$L.struct.temp" and not (same(evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.target.fields in $L.link), $L.field)) and index(nullsub($L.x in $L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link, NULL), $L.temp.fields)>0) then ($L.temp.target=NULL;if (substr($L.x in $L.i in project.target.fields in $L.link, 1, 1)="$") then ($L.temp.target=evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.target.fields in $L.link)) else ($L.temp.target=evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.target.fields in $L.link) in $L.file);if (type($L.temp.target)=8 and not (same(type(evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link) in $L.file), 8))) then ($L.temp.target=evaluate($L.cursorline in $L.temp.target));if (substr($L.x in $L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link, 1, 1)="$") then (evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link)=$L.temp.target) else (evaluate($L.x in $L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link) in $L.target=$L.temp.target)))
$L.rem=" Blank out residual contact information on the following condition: "
$L.rem=" . the file being linked is contacts "
$L.rem=" . the field that the user is searching on is NULL "

if ($G.ess and filename($L.target)="contacts" and null($L.field in $L.target)) then (cleanup(contact.name in $L.target);cleanup(last.name in $L.target);cleanup(first.name in $L.target);cleanup(user.id in $L.target);cleanup(title in $L.target);cleanup(dept in $L.target);cleanup(company in $L.target);cleanup(manager in $L.target))
